snippet: Russia warned Britain on Monday that it would retaliate if Britain imposed any travel restrictions on Russian officials accused of involvement in the prison death of a Russian lawyer.
abstract: Russia warns Great Britain that it will retaliate if Britain imposes any travel restrictions on Russian officials accused of involvement in the 2009 prison death of Russian lawyer Sergei L Magnitsky.
lead_paragraph: Russia warned Britain on Monday that it would retaliate if Britain imposed any travel restrictions on Russian officials accused of involvement in the prison death of a Russian lawyer.
